scripts.watch: concurrently -k -p name -n typescript,watch -c blue,green "yarn tsc --watch" "yarn test:watch"
scripts.test:watch: concurrently -k -p name -n test:1,test:2,test:3 -c blue,green,red "yarn test:1:watch" "yarn test:2:watch" "yarn test:3:watch"
scripts.test: concurrently -k -p name -n test:1,test:2,test:3 -c blue,green,red "yarn test:1" "yarn test:2" "yarn test:3"
